data.title: Mahesh Bhupathi on LinkedIn: #spotlight #spotlight
data.meta_description: I just wanted to express my heartfelt gratitude for recognizing my efforts and awarding me the #Spotlight Award. I am honored and humbled to receive thisâ€¦
data.text: Hello #recruiters and #linkedin fam, I'm on the hunt for new opportunities that will take my creativity and UI/UX skills to the next level! Quick overview: I've tackled 15+ projects across SAAS, Blockchain, E-commerce, Landing pages, Web apps, and Mobile apps. I'm a tech enthusiast with a keen interest in AI, AR, and VR. My superpowers include UI design, UX, user research, wireframing, prototyping, Figma, Sketch, Illustrator, and all that jazz. I'm #opentowork in #chennai and ready for #remotejobs. Oh, and by the way, As an artist, creating illustrations, creative arts, and animations like the one below is a bonus in your firm. Let's connect and chat about potential opportunities! ðŸ’ª P.S. My portfolio is 90% done and about to launch, but I'm reaching out now just in case you have an opening that fits my skills and I can specially showcase it to you ðŸ˜Œ #newopportunity #uiuxjobs #uiux #uiuxroles #chennaijobs #remotejob #jobinterviews #hiringandpromotion #jobalert #nowhiring #job #gethired #jobopening #jobfair #recruiting #jobopening #hiring #joinourteam #jobs #jobhiring #remotework #jobsearch #jobsearching #jobseekers #workingathome #hire #humanresources #recruitersonlinkedin #linkedin #jobseeker #itjobs #itcompaby #ecommerce #designstudio #resume #kissflow #deloitte #google #amazon #infosys #zoho #productdesign #designerjobs #designjobs #uiuxopening #designersonlinkedin #linkedinjobs #job #animation #opentonewopportunities #networking #aicompany #ai #uiuxdesign #cred #jobopportunity #referral #talentacquisition #ceo #founders
